characters: Driver of a white sedan, Driver of a red car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway at night. The road is well-lit with multiple vehicles ahead. The white sedan on the left side of the lane is moving steadily, while the red car on the right side is attempting to overtake the white sedan. The red car is moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane, potentially causing a cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the behavior of the vehicles ahead. The driver is likely preparing to decelerate or change lanes to avoid a potential cut-in from the red car on the right side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right side: A red car, approximately 8 meters away, attempting to overtake the white sedan and moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
